TRY OUT PAWSITIVE

ABOUT US

More than one million suitable pets are euthanized each year, simply because there are too many pets in shelters and too few individuals consider adoption when seeking a companion. If more people adopt pets instead of buying them, the number of animals killed may drastically decrease. Adopting a beloved animal into your household saves them from euthanasia and frees up shelter space for another animal in critical need.

Our goal is to provide people with an easy and quick method of finding their perfect friend from their local shelters or foster homes. Our pet algorithm uses the PetFinder API to find available pets to adopt based on the users' zip codes. We have a wide variety of pets to choose from, such as dogs, birds and even horses! Our search algorithm also provides users with the contact information of the shelters or foster homes, providing easy communication.

Studies have shown that pets can also help people struggling with mental health issues. They're loveable, sometimes cuddly, and also can involve getting outside or being active. COVID-19 has definitely affected people's mental health, so we're hoping to help people and help pets by giving them a way to connect!
